body:
I'm really stoked to get CSS lints. I hadn't seen stylelint before, and it looks like exactly what I'd like to see out of a lint tool (flexible config, plug-ins, auto-fixing).

As an implementation detail, I don't understand why to put this in webpack and only run it for prod builds. Our other lint passes (eslint and flake8) are separate tools that run as a part of therapist. Why did you choose a different route for this check?
